negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2012

Class AC_AgentMR

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.boaframework.BOA
      • genius.core.boaframework.AcceptanceStrategy
        • negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2012.AC_AgentMR

  • public class AC_AgentMR
extends AcceptanceStrategy
    This is the Acceptance condition of AgentMR Due to the connectedness of the original code if another Bidding strategy is being used, the Bidding Strategy of AgentMR will be run in the background
    Author:
    Alexander Dirkzwager
